comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEST3A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEST3A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type ST3A model.  Some static systems utilize a field voltage control loop to linearize the exciter control characteristic. This also makes the output independent of supply source variations until supply limitations are reached.  These systems utilize a variety of controlled-rectifier designs: full thyristor complements or hybrid bridges in either series or shunt configurations. The power source may consist of only a potential source, ei

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Voltage regulator gain (K). This is parameter K in the IEEE Std. Typical Value = 200. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (K). Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kg
contents.comment: Feedback gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Potential circuit gain coefficient (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: km
contents.comment: Forward gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (K).  Typical Value = 7.93. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Potential circuit gain coefficient (K).  Typical Value = 6.15. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: thetap
contents.comment: Potential circuit phase angle (thetap).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: tm
contents.comment: Forward time constant of inner loop field regulator (T).  Typical Value = 0.4. Default: 0

contents.name: vbmax
contents.comment: Maximum excitation voltage (V).  Typical Value = 6.9. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vgmax
contents.comment: Maximum inner loop feedback voltage (V).  Typical Value = 5.8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vimax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator input limit (V).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vimin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator input limit (V).  Typical Value = -0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmmax
contents.comment: Maximum inner loop output (V).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmmin
contents.comment: Minimum inner loop output (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -10. Default: 0.0

contents.name: xl
contents.comment: Reactance associated with potential source (X).  Typical Value = 0.081. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
